definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: The historic rivalries of Ivy League universities in the United States have reached the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 美國常青藤聯盟大學的歷史性競爭演繹到了互聯網上。

sentences.english: Cu Sidhe are huge, dark green fay hounds from the Land of Ever Young.
sentences.chinese: 暗綠色的仙狗們體型巨大，來自常青之地。

sentences.english: What have old ivy leaves to do with your getting well?
sentences.chinese: 常青藤葉子跟你病好不好有什麼關係？

sentences.english: He tends the flower beds and evergreens that he has planted in the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 他總是細心呵護着種植在車道邊的花圃和常青樹。

sentences.english: Evergreen State is organized into programs taught by teams of professors.
sentences.chinese: 常青州學院有一些課題研究，這是由一隊教授組織的。

sentences.english: Lots of evergreen trees have been planted along the roads.
sentences.chinese: 街道兩邊種了很多常青樹。

sentences.english: Flocks of cranes fly up from the further river-bank and fitful gusts of wind rush over the heath.
sentences.chinese: 鶴羣從遠遠的河岸飛起，狂風吹過常青的灌木。

sentences.english: Mr. Yu Changqing, Chairman of the Shandong Gold Group Co. , Ltd. , visited SGE.
sentences.chinese: 山東黃金集團有限公司董事長於常青訪問交易所。

sentences.english: Flocks of cranes fly up from the further river-bank and fitful guests of wind rush over the heath.
sentences.chinese: 鶴羣從遠遠的河岸飛起，狂風吹過常青的灌木。

sentences.english: They also hang garlands of evergreen boughs over the window and wreaths on the doors.
sentences.chinese: 他們還會在窗戶上和門上掛常青樹枝和花環。

sentences.english: The Party Representative of the Detachment, Hong Changqing educates the soldiers and the people with the bitter experience of Qionghua's family.
sentences.chinese: 娘子軍黨代表洪常青以瓊花的世代怨仇教育廣大軍民。

sentences.english: In fact, goalkeepers are still performing at the heightest level such as the evergreen Gianluca Pagliuca.
sentences.chinese: 其實守門員更可以保持好的狀態，比如常青樹帕柳卡。

sentences.english: A rose is a perennial shrub or vine.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰是一種常青灌木或藤本植物。

sentences.english: So we can say, Barbra is an evergreen.
sentences.chinese: 形容芭芭拉藝術生命如常青樹那樣。

sentences.english: We never said our love was evergreen, or as unchanging as the sea.
sentences.chinese: 未曾說過我們的愛如松柏常青，或如滄海不變。

definition: deep roots and vigorous foliage (idiom)/(fig.) well established and growing strongly
pine and cypress/fig. chaste and undefiled/fig. tomb
